ayas.text: ṭā sīn ۚ tilka āyātul qur-āni wakitābin mubīn
hudan wabushrā lil-mu-minīn
alladhīna yuqīmūnaṣ ṣalāta wayu-tūnaz zakāta wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn
innal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati zayyannā lahum a`mālahum fahum ya`mahūn
ulā-ikal ladhīna lahum sū-ul `adhābi wahum fil-ākhirati humul-akhsarūn
wa innaka latulaqqal qur-āna min ladun ḥakīmin `alīm
idh qāla mūsā li-ahlihi innī ānastu nāran sa-ātīkum minhā bikhabarin aw ātīkum bishihābin qabasin la`allakum taṣṭalūn
falammā jā-ahā nūdiya an būrika man fin nāri wa man ḥawlahā wasubḥānallāhi rabbil `ālamīn
yāmūsā innahu anallāhul `azīzul ḥakīm
wa-alqi `aṣāk ۚ falammā ra-āhā tahtazzu ka-annahā jānnun wallā mudbiran walam yu`aqqib ۚ yāmūsā lā takhaf innī lā yakhāfu ladayyal mursalūn
illā man ẓalama thumma baddala ḥusnan ba`da sū-in fa-innī ghafūrun raḥīm
wa-adkhil yadaka fī jaybika takhruj bayḍā-a min ghayri sū-ī ۖ fī tis`i āyātin ilā fir`awna waqawmih ۚ innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīn
falammā jā-at hum āyātunā mubṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥrun mubīn
wajaḥadū bihā wastayqanat-hā anfusuhum ẓul-man wa`uluwwā ۚ fanẓur kayfa kāna `āqibatul mufsidīn
walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna `il-mā ۖ waqālal ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī faḍḍalanā `alā kathīrin min `ibādihil mu-minīn
wawaritha sulaymānu dāwūd ۖ waqāla yā-ayyuhan nāsu `ullimnā manṭiqaṭ ṭayri wa-ūtīnā min kulli shay-ī ۖ inna hādhā lahuwal faḍlul mubīn
waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu minal jinni wal-insi waṭ ṭayri fahum yūza`ūn
ḥattā idhā ataw `alā wādin namli qālat namlatun yā-ayyuhan namlud-khulū masākinakum lā yaḥṭimannakum sulaymānu wajunūduhu wahum lā yash`urūn
fatabassama ḍāḥikan min qawlihā waqāla rabbi awzi`nī an ashkura ni`matakal latī an`amta `alayya wa`alā wālidayya wa-an a`mala ṣāliḥan tarḍāhu wa-adkhilnī biraḥmatika fī `ibādikaṣ ṣāliḥīn
watafaqqadaṭ ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā aral hud-huda am kāna minal ghā-ibīn
la-u`adhhibannahu `adhāban shadīdan aw la-adhbaḥannahu aw laya-tiyannī bisulṭānin mubīn
famakatha ghayra ba`īdin faqāla aḥaṭtu bimā lam tuḥiṭ bihi waji-tuka min saba-in binaba-in yaqīn
innī wajadtum-ra-atan tamlikuhum wa-ūtiyat min kulli shay-in walahā `arshun `aẓīm
wajadtuhā waqawmahā yasjudūna lishhamsi min dūnillāhi wazayyana lahumush shayṭānu a`mālahum faṣaddahum `anis sabīli fahum lā yahtadūn
allā yasjudū lillāhil ladhī yukhrijul khab a fis samāwāti wal-arḍi waya`lamu mā tukhfūna wa mā tu`linūn
allāhu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbul `arshil `aẓīm ۩
qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta minal kādhibīn
idh-hab bikitābī hādhā fa-alqih ilayhim thumma tawalla `anhum fanẓur mādhā yarji`ūn
qālat yā-ayyuhal mala-u innī ulqiya ilayya kitābun karīm
innahu min sulaymāna wa innahu bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm
allā ta`lū `alayya wa-tūnī muslimīn
qālat yā-ayyuhal mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭi`atan amran ḥattā tash-hadūn
qālū naḥnu ulū quwwatin wa-ulū ba-sin shadīdin wal-amru ilayki fanẓurī mādhā ta-murīn
qālat innal mulūka idhā dakhalū qaryatan afsadūhā waja`alū a`izzata ahlihā adhillah ۖ wakadhālika yaf`alūn
wa innī mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarji`ul mursalūn
falammā jā-a sulaymāna qāla atumiddūnani bimālin famā ātāniyallāhu khayrun mimmā ātākum bal antum bihadiyyatikum tafraḥūn
irji` ilayhim falana-tiyannahum bijunūdin lā qibala lahum bihā walanukhrijannahum minhā adhillatan wahum ṣāghirūn
qāla yā-ayyuhal mala-u ayyukum ya-tīnī bi`arshihā qabla an ya-tūnī muslimīn
qāla `ifrītun minal jinni ana ātīka bihi qabla an taqūma min maqāmik ۖ wa innī `alayhi laqawiyyun amīn

qālal ladhī `indahu `il-mun minal kitābi ana ātīka bihi qabla an yartadda ilayka ṭarfuk ۚ falammā ra-āhu mustaqirran `indahu qāla hādhā min faḍli rabbī liyabluwanī a-ashkuru am akfur ۖ wa man shakara fa-innamā yashkuru linafsih ۖ wa man kafara fa-inna rabbī ghaniyyun karīm
qāla nakkirū lahā `arshahā nanẓur atahtadī am takūnu minal ladhīna lā yahtadūn
falammā jā-at qīla ahākadhā `arshuk ۖ qālat ka-annahu huw ۚ wa-ūtīnal `il-ma min qablihā wakunnā muslimīn
waṣaddahā mā kānat ta`budu min dūnillāh ۖ innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīn

qīla lahad-khuliṣ ṣarḥ ۖ falammā ra-at-hu ḥasibat-hu lujjatan wakashafat `an sāqayhā ۚ qāla innahu ṣarḥun mumarradun min qawārīr ۗ qālat rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī wa-aslamtu ma`a sulaymāna lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn
walaqad arsalnā ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani'-budullāha fa-idhā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūn
qāla yāqawmi lima tasta`jilūna bis sayyi-ati qablal-ḥasanah ۖ lawlā tastaghfirūnallāha la`allakum turḥamūn
qāluṭ-ṭayyarnā bika wabiman ma`ak ۚ qāla ṭā-irukum `indallāh ۖ bal antum qawmun tuftanūn
wakāna fil madīnati tis`atu rahṭiy yufsidūna fil-arḍi walā yuṣliḥūn
qālū taqāsamū billāhi lanubayyitannahu wa-ahlahu thumma lanaqūlanna liwaliyyihi mā shahidnā mahlika ahlihi wa innā laṣādiqūn
wa makarū makran wa makarnā makran wahum lā yash`urūn
fanẓur kayfa kāna `āqibatu makrihim annā dammarnāhum waqawmahum ajma`īn
fatilka buyūtuhum khāwiyatan bimā ẓalamū ۗ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan liqawmiy ya`lamūn
wa-anjaynal ladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūn
walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi ata-tūnal fāḥishata wa-antum tubṣirūn
a-innakum lata-tūnar rijāla shahwatan min dūnin nisā-i ۚ bal antum qawmun tajhalūn
famā kāna jawāba qawmihi illā an qālū akhrijū āla lūṭin min qaryatikum ۖ innahum unāsun yataṭahharūn
fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illam-ra-atahu qaddarnāhā minal ghābirīn
wa-amṭarnā `alayhim maṭarā ۖ fasā-a maṭarul mundharīn
qulil ḥamdu lillāhi wasalāmun `alā `ibādihil ladhīnaṣ-ṭafā ۗ ālllāhu khayrun ammā yushrikūn
amman khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa-anzala lakum minas samā-i mā-an fa-anbatnā bihi ḥadā-iqa dhāta bahjatim mā kāna lakum an tunbitū shajarahā ۗ a-ilāhun ma`allāh ۚ bal hum qawmun ya`dilūn
amman ja`alal-arḍa qarāran waja`ala khilālahā anhāran waja`ala lahā rawāsiya waja`ala baynal baḥrayni ḥājizā ۗ a-ilāhun ma`allāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn
amman yujībul muḍṭarra idhā da`āhu wayakshifus sū a wayaj`alukum khulafā-al-arḍ ۗ a-ilāhun ma`allāh ۚ qalīlan mā tadhakkarūn
amman yahdīkum fī ẓulumātil barri wal baḥri wa man yursilur riyāḥa bushran bayna yaday raḥmatih ۗ a-ilāhun ma`allāh ۚ ta`ālallāhu `ammā yushrikūn
amman yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduhu wa man yarzuqukum minas samā-i wal-arḍ ۗ a-ilāhun ma`allāh ۚ qul hātū burhānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn
qul lā ya`lamu man fis samāwāti wal-arḍil ghayba illallāh ۚ wa mā yash`urūna ayyāna yub`athūn
balid-dāraka `il-muhum fil-ākhirah ۚ bal hum fī shakkin minhā ۖ bal hum minhā `amūn
waqālal ladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban wa-ābā-unā a-innā lamukhrajūn
laqad wu`idnā hādhā naḥnu wa-ābā-unā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn
qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul mujrimīn
walā taḥzan `alayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūn
wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn
qul `asā an yakūna radifa lakum ba`ḍul ladhī tasta`jilūn
wa inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin `alan nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūn
wa inna rabbaka laya`lamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wa mā yu`linūn
wa mā min ghā-ibatin fis samā-i wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīn
inna hādhal qur-āna yaquṣṣu `alā banī isrā-iyla aktharal ladhī hum fīhi yakhtalifūn
wa innahu lahudan waraḥmatun lil-mu-minīn
inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥukmih ۚ wahuwal `azīzul `alīm
fatawakkal `alallāh ۖ innaka `alal-ḥaqqil mubīn
innaka lā tusmi`ul mawtā walā tusmi`uṣ ṣummad du`ā-a idhā wallaw mudbirīn
wa mā anta bihādil `umyi `an ḍalālatihim ۖ in tusmi`u illā man yu-minu bi-āyātinā fahum muslimūn
wa idhā waqa`al qawlu `alayhim akhrajnā lahum dābbatan minal-arḍi tukallimuhum annan nāsa kānū bi-āyātinā lā yūqinūn
wayawma naḥshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimman yukadhhibu bi-āyātinā fahum yūza`ūn
ḥattā idhā jā-ū qāla akadhhabtum bi-āyātī walam tuḥīṭū bihā `il-man ammādhā kuntum ta`malūn
wawaqa`al qawlu `alayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūn
alam yaraw annā ja`alnal layla liyaskunū fīhi wan nahāra mubṣirā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn
wayawma yunfakhu fiṣ ṣūri fafazi`a man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man shā-allāh ۚ wakullun atawhu dākhirīn
wataral jibāla taḥsabuhā jāmidatan wahiya tamurru marras saḥāb ۚ ṣun`allāhil ladhī atqana kulla shay-ī ۚ innahu khabīrun bimā taf`alūn
man jā-a bil ḥasanati falahu khayrun minhā wahum min faza`iy yawma-idhin āminūn
wa man jā-a bis sayyi-ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fin nāri hal tujzawna illā mā kuntum ta`malūn
innamā umirtu an a`buda rabba hādhihil baldatil ladhī ḥarramahā walahu kullu shay-ī ۖ wa-umirtu an akūna minal muslimīn
wa-an atluwal qur-ān ۖ famanih-tadā fa-innamā yahtadī linafsih ۖ wa man ḍalla faqul innamā ana minal mundhirīn
waqulil ḥamdu lillāhi sayurīkum āyātihi fata`rifūnahā ۚ wa mā rabbuka bighāfilin `ammā ta`malūn
